ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES.desc: Allows read/write access to the "properties" table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.

ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.desc: Allows an app to access approximate location derived from network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi.

ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.desc: Allows an app to access precise location from location sources such as GPS, cell towers, and Wi-Fi.

ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS.desc: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands

ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.desc: Allows an application to create mock location providers for testing

ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.desc: Allows applications to access information about networks

ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER.desc: Allows an application to use SurfaceFlinger's low level features.

ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.desc: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks

ACCOUNT_MANAGER.desc: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.

ADD_VOICEMAIL.desc: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.desc: Allows an application to act as an AccountAuthenticator for the AccountManager

BATTERY_STATS.desc: Allows an application to collect battery statistics

BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by an AccessibilityService,to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_APPWIDGET.desc: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data.

BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.desc: Must be required by device administration receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.

BIND_INPUT_METHOD.desc: Must be required by an InputMethodService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_NFC_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.desc: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by a TextService (e.g.

BIND_VPN_SERVICE.desc: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_WALLPAPER.desc: Must be required by a WallpaperService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BLUETOOTH.desc: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices

BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.desc: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices

BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.desc: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction.

BRICK.desc: Required to be able to disable the device (very dangerous!).

BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED.desc: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.

BROADCAST_SMS.desc: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.

BROADCAST_STICKY.desc: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents.

BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.desc: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.

CALL_PHONE.desc: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

CALL_PRIVILEGED.desc: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

CAMERA.desc: Required to be able to access the camera device.

CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.desc: Allows an application to capture audio output.

CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.desc: Allows an application to capture secure video output.

CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.desc: Allows an application to capture video output.

CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE.desc: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.

CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.desc: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.

CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.desc: Allows applications to change network connectivity state

CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE.desc: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode

CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.desc: Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state

CLEAR_APP_CACHE.desc: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.

CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.desc: Allows an application to clear user data.

CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES.desc: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.

DELETE_CACHE_FILES.desc: Allows an application to delete cache files.

DELETE_PACKAGES.desc: Allows an application to delete packages.

DEVICE_POWER.desc: Allows low-level access to power management.

DIAGNOSTIC.desc: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.

DISABLE_KEYGUARD.desc: Allows applications to disable the keyguard

DUMP.desc: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.

EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.desc: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.

FACTORY_TEST.desc: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user.

FORCE_BACK.desc: Allows an application to force a BACK operation on whatever is the top activity.

GET_ACCOUNTS.desc: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service

GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.desc: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.

GET_TASKS.desc: Allows an application to get information about the currently or recently running tasks.

GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.desc: Allows an application to retrieve private information about the current top activity, such as any assist context it can provide.

GLOBAL_SEARCH.desc: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data.

INJECT_EVENTS.desc: Allows an application to inject user events (keys, touch, trackball) into the event stream and deliver them to ANY window.

INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER.desc: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.

INSTALL_PACKAGES.desc: Allows an application to install packages.

INSTALL_SHORTCUT.desc: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher

INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW.desc: Allows an application to open windows that are for use by parts of the system user interface.

INTERNET.desc: Allows applications to open network sockets.

KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES.desc: Allows an application to call killBackgroundProcesses(String).

LOCATION_HARDWARE.desc: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.

MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.desc: Allows an application to manage the list of accounts in the AccountManager

MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.desc: Allows an application to manage (create, destroy, Z-order) application tokens in the window manager.

MANAGE_DOCUMENTS.desc: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.

MASTER_CLEAR.desc: Not for use by third-party applications.

MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.desc: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.

MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.desc: Allows an application to modify global audio settings

MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.desc: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc.

MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS.desc: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.

MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS.desc: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.

NFC.desc: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC

PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.desc: This constant was deprecated in API level 9. This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.

PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS.desc: Allows an application to monitor, modify, or abort outgoing calls.

READ_CALENDAR.desc: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.

READ_CALL_LOG.desc: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

READ_CONTACTS.desc: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.desc: Allows an application to read from external storage.

READ_FRAME_BUFFER.desc: Allows an application to take screen shots and more generally get access to the frame buffer data.

READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS.desc: Allows an application to read (but not write) the user's browsing history and bookmarks.

READ_INPUT_STATE.desc: This constant was deprecated in API level 16. The API that used this permission has been removed.

READ_LOGS.desc: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.

READ_PHONE_STATE.desc: Allows read only access to phone state.

READ_PROFILE.desc: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

READ_SMS.desc: Allows an application to read SMS messages.

READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.desc: Allows an application to read from the user's social stream.

READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.desc: Allows applications to read the sync settings

READ_SYNC_STATS.desc: Allows applications to read the sync stats

READ_USER_DICTIONARY.desc: Allows an application to read the user dictionary.

REBOOT.desc: Required to be able to reboot the device.

RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED.desc: Allows an application to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.

RECEIVE_MMS.desc: Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages, to record or perform processing on them.

RECEIVE_SMS.desc: Allows an application to monitor incoming SMS messages, to record or perform processing on them.

RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.desc: Allows an application to monitor incoming WAP push messages.

RECORD_AUDIO.desc: Allows an application to record audio

REORDER_TASKS.desc: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks

RESTART_PACKAGES.desc: This constant was deprecated in API level 8. The restartPackage(String) API is no longer supported.

SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE.desc: Allows an application (Phone) to send a request to other applications to handle the respond-via-message action during incoming calls.

SEND_SMS.desc: Allows an application to send SMS messages.

SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.desc: Allows an application to watch and control how activities are started globally in the system.

SET_ALARM.desc: Allows an application to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.

SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.desc: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.

SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.desc: Modify the global animation scaling factor.

SET_ORIENTATION.desc: Allows low-level access to setting the orientation (actually rotation) of the screen.

SET_POINTER_SPEED.desc: Allows low-level access to setting the pointer speed.

SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS.desc: This constant was deprecated in API level 7. No longer useful, see addPackageToPreferred(String) for details.

SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.desc: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.

SET_TIME.desc: Allows applications to set the system time.

SET_TIME_ZONE.desc: Allows applications to set the system time zone

SET_WALLPAPER.desc: Allows applications to set the wallpaper

SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.desc: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints

SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES.desc: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.

STATUS_BAR.desc: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.

SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.desc: Allows an application to allow access the subscribed feeds ContentProvider.

SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.desc: Allows an application to open windows using the type TYPE_SYSTEM_ALERT, shown on top of all other applications.

TRANSMIT_IR.desc: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available

UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT.desc: Allows an application to uninstall a shortcut in Launcher

UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.desc: Allows an application to update device statistics.

USE_CREDENTIALS.desc: Allows an application to request authtokens from the AccountManager

USE_SIP.desc: Allows an application to use SIP service

WAKE_LOCK.desc: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming

WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.desc: Allows applications to write the apn settings.

WRITE_CALENDAR.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's calendar data.

WRITE_CALL_LOG.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

WRITE_CONTACTS.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.desc: Allows an application to write to external storage.

WRITE_GSERVICES.desc: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.

WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's browsing history and bookmarks.

WRITE_PROFILE.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's personal profile data.

WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.desc: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.

WRITE_SETTINGS.desc: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.

WRITE_SMS.desc: Allows an application to write SMS messages.

WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.desc: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's social stream data.

WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.desc: Allows applications to write the sync settings

WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.desc: Allows an application to write to the user dictionary.
